types:type.name: md-json
md-emp-json
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type md_emp_json = {| empID: Number {"typeId": "int"}, empName: String, empEmail: String, empStatus: String |} {"example": "{\\\"empID\\\":2321,\\\"empName\\\":\\\"Joe Smith\\\",\\\"empEmail\\\":\\\"joe.smith@gmail.com\\\",\\\"empStatus\\\":\\\"A\\\"}"}
